moves.5. Qa4+ c6: This is an OK defense, but Heather, you need to try to get your major pieces out in front of your pawns where possible, and mainly so you do not break down your pawn formation (we have not talked about this yet). I think a better defense would have been knight to c6.
moves.6. Nc3 Be6: Not my favorite move because bishops like space, and are usually best suited to later in the game, early on, its the knights that you should maneuver.
moves.7. b4 Bh6: Once square too far...I like the bishop to protect the corner in g7 fianchetto you bishops to both g7 and b 7
moves.8... Ng8: and this isn't good either because of .....
moves.9... Qh4+: now this is just plane desperate...Remember, you counter an attack on the wing by attacking in the middle...
moves.10... Qg5: run away...so make a nice home for your king, attack cautiously !!!
